Для вчасної ( швидкої ) доставки, обід к: For timely (fast) delivery, it is better to order lunch before 11 o'clock.
Обід замовляється відповідно до дня тижн: Lunch is ordered according to the day of the week.
Працюємо з понеділка по п'ятницю: We work from Monday to Friday
Для Вашої зручності здійснюємо доставку: For your convenience, we deliver complex lunches, drinks, desserts, meat sets, and banquet menus upon prior order.
Замовлення можна здійснити зателефонував: You can order by calling the number:
Написавши в дірект фейсбук чи інстаграм: By sending a direct message to the Facebook or Instagram pages
При замовленні від 300 грн доставка безк: Delivery is free for orders over UAH 300
До 300 грн доставка вього 40 грн: Up to UAH 300, delivery costs UAH 40
За межами міста вартість доставки узгодж: Outside the city, the cost of delivery is negotiated individually.
Щоб отримати замовлення комплексного обі: In order to receive an order for a complex lunch on time, the order must be placed before 11 a.m. on the day of the order. If the order is made after 11 o'clock, due to a large number of orders, the lunch may be delivered with a delay.

5% на дорозі не валяються! Бажаєте Еконо: Do you want to save even more? Then order our meat sets and pick them up yourself. Convenient location in the city center.
Умови прості! Замовляйте М'ясні сети (Fo: The conditions are simple! Order Meat Sets (FoodBox), tag our page - @lapota.ternopil, in stories, on Instagram or Facebook, and get your honest - 15% on the next order of sets. And remember the main thing - our discounts can be missed! * maximum possible discount of 25%
ОГО, а так можна? З ЛЯПОТА можна багато: With LAPOTA you can save a lot and eat deliciously. Come to our institution at the address: str. Ruska, 56a, 4th building of TNTU, from 3 p.m., and pick up your favorite dishes from the distribution, at a super favorable price - 35%.
Ми дуже Любимо ВАС. Тому даруємо на Ваше: We love YOU very much. That's why we give you 10% on the order of a festive table for your holiday! * only meat sets participate in the promotion.
Так, так. З ЛЯПОТА можна отримати безкош: Yes Yes. You can get a free lunch from LAPOTA! Everything is simpler than it seems. Bookmark our page @lapota.ternopil, in stories, on Instagram or Facebook - with our lunches, and you will receive a free comprehensive lunch. * subject to an order of 3 or more meals; * to 1 address, the customer can only have 1 delivery of the promotional lunch.
ЛЯПОТА- смачна доставка обідів щодня. На: LAPOTA - delicious lunch delivery every day. Our cafe has been on the market of a cool city since 2021. We opened our doors at the peak of COVID-19, because we understood that the people of Ternopil need to have a tasty and budget-friendly lunch. Delivery has been launched for convenience. During this time, we have grown and improved. We have two physical institutions: in the city center (Ruska St., 56a, building 4 of TNTU), and in the Druzhba neighborhood (Lvivska St., 11a, building 11 of ZUNU). The peculiarity of our institution is that we can offer our visitors a variety of complex lunches for delivery every day, as well as a large assortment of food is presented directly in the institution. We have our own production of dumplings and dumplings. Our kitchen is equipped only with professional equipment. We deliver complex lunches: to commercial establishments, preschools, to children's camps, and to various sports events that take place in our city.
Також ЛЯПОТА готує дуже смачні м'ясні се: LAPOTA also prepares very tasty meat sets. If you want to celebrate an important event, in the office or at home, by ordering from us, you can not only save a lot of time, but also treat your guests to delicious food.
Наш заклад приймає замовлення на фуршети: Our institution accepts orders for buffets and banquets, both for delivery and in the institution. We have three halls for celebrating important events: 2 halls at TNTU (up to 25 people and up to 120 people) and at ZUNU (up to 60 people). Also, if necessary, you can order a conference hall.
We are open from Monday to Friday.
Ви можете перевірити меню на наступний т: You can check the menu for the next week.
